Module hanyaeger

Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput

package com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput
Interfaces that enable an instance of YaegerEntity, YaegerScene or both to receive user input.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    KeyListener
    A KeyListener is notified when the set of pressed keys changes.
    MouseButtonPressedListener
    Being a MouseButtonPressedListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if a MouseButton has been clicked while the mouse pointer is on the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.
    MouseButtonReleasedListener
    Being a MouseButtonReleasedListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if a MouseButton has been released while the mouse pointer is on the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.
    MouseDragEnterListener
    Being a MouseDragEnterListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified when the area defined by its BoundingBox is being entered by something that is being dragged.
    MouseDragExitedListener
    Being a MouseDragExitedListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified when the area defined by its BoundingBox is being exited by something that is being dragged.
    MouseDraggedListener
    Being a MouseDraggedListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified when a mouse button is pressed on this the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene, and then dragged.
    MouseDropListener
    Being a MouseDropListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified when within the area defined by its BoundingBox something that is being dragged is dropped.
    MouseEnterListener
    Being a MouseEnterListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if the Mouse Cursor has entered the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.
    MouseExitListener
    Being a MouseExitListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if the Mouse Cursor has exited the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.
    MouseMovedListener
    Being a MouseMovedListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if the mouse has been moved.
    MouseMovedWhileDraggingListener
    Being a MouseMovedWhileDraggingListener enables the YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to be notified if the mouse has been moved while it is dragging a MouseDraggedListener or nothing at all.
